description:
After graduating from high school, some people decide to backpack through Europe or just take some time off.
Ronnie decided he was going to do something different.
He'd been kind of a trouble maker in school. He'd pulled down his pants to show his cock to a girl in front of a big group, he'd picked on some other kids, and he'd broken into the gym's weight room after hours (for various reasons).
When we met Ronnie he was 18 but had
graduated from high school.
He told us that he wanted to do one more wild thing before settling down and heading off to college...
title: Ronnie
